We can "simulate" by running our function... 

```{r}
sim_mean_sd(n_subj = 400)
```


Can I "verify" the CLT??

first with a `for` loop.

```{r}
output = vector("list", length = 100)

for (i in 1:100) {
  
  output[[i]] = sim_mean_sd(30)
  
}

output %>% 
  bind_rows() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = mu_hat)) +
  geom_density()
```

Try to repeat it with a map statement..

```{r}
sim_results_df <- 
  tibble(
    iter = 1:100
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    results = map(iter, sim_mean_sd, n_subj = 30)
  ) %>% 
  unnest(results)
```

```{r}
sim_results_df <- 
  expand_grid(
    sample_size = c(30,60,90,120),
    iter = 1:100
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    results = map(sample_size, sim_mean_sd)
  ) %>% 
  unnest(results)
```
